name: Princess Sera adventures
description:
Princess Sera adventures - In this adventure platformer, you play the role of a naughty princess with a sweet tooth. Her passion for sweets is so great that she escapes from the palace just to collect as much ice cream and peanut butter as possible. But be careful! Sweets are guarded by wild animals that will not give them away without a fight, and deep chasms and thorns only add problems ... Jump over chasms and enemies as carefully as possible, your life depends on it! Collect as many sweets as possible and do not manage to die until your parents find you and save you.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
